entry.name: jQuery.isFunction
entry.title: jQuery.isFunction()

argument.name: obj
argument.desc: Object to test whether or not it is a function.

entry.desc: Determine if the argument passed is a JavaScript function object.

longdesc.p: Note: As of jQuery 1.3, functions provided by the browser like alert() and DOM element methods like getAttribute() are not guaranteed to be detected as functions in browsers such as Internet Explorer.

example.desc: Finds out if the parameter is a function.
